alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 01 at 5:04AM AKST until January 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills and blowing snow expected. Expect wind chills between 50 to 70 below zero. Plan on areas of significantly reduced visibilities and slick roadways to create difficult travel conditions at times. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * WHEN...Now to 6 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dangerously cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will cause areas of significant blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create dangerously low wind chill values. Frost bite can occur quickly and even hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken.
